text: @GavinNewsom Virus’ don’t disappear overnight. You’re not irradicating it— just perpetuating the inevitable. You’ll let Walmart/Target remain open but close beaches and trails for “safety”?! Obviously only care about $ and not about people’s mental health 🐑 #COVID19
